Description: Secure Web Application Infrastructure - VPC, EC2, RDS, and ALB with security best practices for us-east-1

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for resource naming (e.g., dev, staging, prod)

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for the application server

InstanceCount.Description: Number of EC2 instances to deploy

SSLCertificateArn.Description: ARN of the SSL certificate for HTTPS (leave empty to disable HTTPS)

AllowedCIDRs.Description: Comma-delimited list of CIDR blocks allowed to access the ALB (e.g., 203.0.113.0/24,198.51.100.0/24). Use 0.0.0.0/0 for unrestricted access.

EnableHighAvailabilityNAT.Description: Enable second NAT Gateway for high availability (incurs additional cost). Set to true for production environments.

DeployRDS.Description: Deploy RDS instance. Set to false for LocalStack Community (RDS timeout issues). Set to true for production AWS.

Properties.Description: Database password for RDS instance with automatic rotation

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer

Properties.Description: Allow HTTP traffic from allowed IPs - CIDR 0
Allow HTTP traffic from allowed IPs - CIDR 1
Allow HTTP traffic from allowed IPs - CIDR 2
Allow HTTPS traffic from allowed IPs - CIDR 0
Allow HTTPS traffic from allowed IPs - CIDR 1
Allow HTTPS traffic from allowed IPs - CIDR 2
Parameter group for MySQL with SSL enforcement

Properties.AlarmDescription: High CPU utilization alarm for EC2 instances
High CPU utilization alarm for RDS instance
High response time from ALB targets

PublicSubnet1Id.Description: ID of the first public subnet

PublicSubnet2Id.Description: ID of the second public subnet

PrivateSubnet1Id.Description: ID of the first private subnet

PrivateSubnet2Id.Description: ID of the second private subnet

NatGateway2Id.Description: ID of the second NAT Gateway (only available when high availability is enabled)

ApplicationLoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

ApplicationLoadBalancerHTTPSURL.Description: HTTPS URL of the Application Load Balancer (only available when HTTPS is enabled)

RDSInstanceEndpoint.Description: RDS instance endpoint (only available when RDS is deployed)

AutoScalingGroupName.Description: Name of the Auto Scaling Group

SNSTopicArn.Description: ARN of the SNS topic for alerts

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix used for this deployment

SecurityHeaders.Description: Security headers implemented in the web server
SecurityHeaders.Value: X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, X-XSS-Protection, Strict-Transport-Security, Referrer-Policy, Content-Security-Policy
